original_text: And Joseph was the governor over the land, and he it was that sold to all the people of the land: and Joseph's brethren came, and bowed down themselves before him with their faces to the earth.
korean_text: 때에 요셉이 나라의 총리로서 그 땅 모든 백성에게 곡식을 팔더니 요셉의 형들이 와서 그 앞에서 땅에 엎드려 절하매

sentences.original_text: And Joseph was the governor over the land
and he it was that sold to all the people of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 땅의 모든 백성에게 곡식을 팔았으며

sentences.original_text: and bowed down themselves before him with their faces to the earth
